about_me.title: About Me
about_me.education: I completed my 10th and 12th grades from Khukurdaha IC MM High School. Currently, I am pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering with a focus on AI/ML at Brainware University in Barasat, where I am in my 5th semester.
about_me.passion: I have a strong passion for coding and technology, which has driven me to learn and work with a variety of programming languages including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, Python, C, and C++.
about_me.future: I'm excited about applying my skills to real-world problems and continuously exploring new advancements in the field of computer science.
about_me.contact: Feel free to connect with me if you share similar interests or if you'd like to discuss potential opportunities!
